模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.tuition

类 TriState

java.lang.Object
com.example.tuition.Student
com.example.tuition.NonResident
com.example.tuition.TriState
public class TriState extends NonResident
A subclass of student constructing the tri-state student structure which storing the different attributes of a tri-state student.
作者:
Xinyu Meng, Chengyu Liang

  • 构造器详细资料

    • TriState

      public TriState(String name, Major major, int credit, String iftristate)
      Constructor method to creating a tri-state student structure with the corresponding attributes.
      参数:
      name - tri-state student`s name.
      major - tri-state student`s major.
      credit - tri-state student`s credit.
      iftristate - where the tri-state student comes from.
